Nightlight::

"Gramps is following  this corritor" said worried Nighlight "Take 
care... he has a weapon in his hand and I don't sure what he will do 
with it.."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Perplex: Clash and Serge? I discovered those to be the names of 
those 2 who
> attacked us before. We are going to have no choice but to fight this
> assassin. Don't take him lightly for a second, though...
>

to,

you"
